text:
If the directory structure to reach a .jsp file is deep, which results in a 
long name for the java file in the work directory of tomcat, example 
(_0002fWEB_0002dINF_0002fscreens_0002fAdmin_0002fapplications_0002fswim_0002fupd
ateupgrade_0002fUpgradePathSelect_0002ejspUpgradePathSelect_jsp_0.java)

Tomcat throws this error.
Problem with File
WEB-INF/screens/Admin/applications/swim/updateupgrade/UpgradeFinish.jsp!!!
Unable to compile class for JSPerror: Can't write:
D:\homedirectory\ranjiith\doc\jakarta-tomcat\work\localhost_8080%2Frme-swi
mng\WEB_0002dINF\screens\Admin\applications\swim\updateupgrade\_0002fWEB_0
002dINF_0002fscreens_0002fAdmin_0002fapplications_0002fswim_0002fupdateupg
rade_0002fUpgradeFinish_0002ejspUpgradeFinish_jsp_0.class 1 error
creator: ranjiith@yahoo.com

text: *** Bug 9249 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: pier@betaversion.org
william.barker@wilshire.com
text:
Upgrading to either 3.3 or 4.x fixes this.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 1210 ***
